songs.title: Extra Hype
songs.lyrics:
Niggas always puttin' extra hype on 'em
Niggas always puttin' extra hype on 'em
Cuple things just .... in the dark and put some lights to it
Niggas always puttin' extra hype on 'em
Niggas ain't really that nice on 'em
You niggas ain't really that nice on him
I strip it down ... and put the pipes on ya
Turn your wallet to a thug and put the price on him
Niggas always puttin' extra hype on 'em
Niggas always puttin' extra hype on 'em

If you frigid I'm to cold
You Niggas are Chuko
